title: The Need for Rivalry in Transformation: More on Vervaeke/Anlietner Conversation
description:
Nickb has some thoughts from the talk with @John Vervaeke and @Deep Talks posted yesterday https://youtu.be/lr6hBeq9dBs

Also from my conversation with Nick on Deconstructing from Pentecostalism https://youtu.be/dqDkTvzgaJg
